p: In conclusion, in terms of outbreak times, SARS-CoV was the earliest, followed by MERS-CoV, then SARS-CoV-2. To date, MERS-CoV has the longest duration of infection, and SARS-CoV-2 appears to be the most infectious. SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV, and SARS-CoV-2 infections have similar symptoms, including fever, cough, myalgia, and shortness of breath, among others.
